name: Classic Pizza
shortDescription: The cornerstone of Victorious Pizza's menu. Our classic pizza is made with our signature hand-tossed dough, topped with our special tomato sauce, and a blend of mozzarella, parmesan, and romano cheeses. It's the perfect pizza for any occasion.
longDescription: The Pizza is a classic dish that has been around for centuries. It is a staple of Italian cuisine and is loved by people all over the world. The Pizza is a simple dish that is made from dough, tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings. It is a versatile dish that can be customized to suit any taste. Whether you like your pizza with meat, vegetables, or a little bit of everything, the Pizza is the perfect choice. It is a delicious and satisfying dish that is perfect for any occasion. Whether you are having a party, a family dinner, or just a casual meal, the Pizza is the perfect choice.

name: The Behemoth
shortDescription: Our Behemoth pizza is a feast for the senses. It's made with our signature hand-tossed dough, topped with our special tomato sauce, a blend of mozzarella, parmesan, and romano cheeses, and a variety of meats and vegetables. It's the perfect pizza for anyone with a big appetite.

name: Cheeseburger
shortDescription: Our cheeseburger is a classic American favorite. It's made with a juicy beef patty, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles, all on a toasted sesame seed bun. It's the perfect meal for lunch or dinner.
longDescription: The Cheeseburger is a classic American favorite that is perfect for lunch or dinner.
